title: 给大家分享个我原创的自定义生成预设。
author: §4我哈啊
txt_content: {"coordinateScale":683.412,"heightScale":683.412,"lowerLimitScale":512.0,"upperLimitScale":512.0,"depthNoiseScaleX":200.001,"depthNoiseScaleZ":199.999,"depthNoiseScaleExponent":0.5,"mainNoiseScaleX":80.001,"mainNoiseScaleY":150.0,"mainNoiseScaleZ":79.999,"baseSize":8.499,"stretchY":12.0,"biomeDepthWeight":1.0,"biomeDepthOffset":0.0,"biomeScaleWeight":1.0,"biomeScaleOffset":0.1,"seaLevel":63,"useCaves":true,"useDungeons":true,"dungeonChance":10,"useStrongholds":true,"useVillages":true,"useMineShafts":true,"useTemples":true,"useMonuments":true,"useMansions":true,"useRavines":true,"useWaterLakes":true,"waterLakeChance":5,"useLavaLakes":true,"lavaLakeChance":75,"useLavaOceans":false,"fixedBiome":-1,"biomeSize":7,"riverSize":5,"dirtSize":33,"dirtCount":8,"dirtMinHeight":0,"dirtMaxHeight":256,"gravelSize":33,"gravelCount":6,"gravelMinHeight":0,"gravelMaxHeight":256,"graniteSize":33,"graniteCount":8,"graniteMinHeight":0,"graniteMaxHeight":80,"dioriteSize":33,"dioriteCount":8,"dioriteMinHeight":0,"dioriteMaxHeight":80,"andesiteSize":33,"andesiteCount":8,"andesiteMinHeight":0,"andesiteMaxHeight":80,"coalSize":50,"coalCount":5,"coalMinHeight":0,"coalMaxHeight":128,"ironSize":27,"ironCount":5,"ironMinHeight":0,"ironMaxHeight":64,"goldSize":16,"goldCount":1,"goldMinHeight":0,"goldMaxHeight":32,"redstoneSize":16,"redstoneCount":3,"redstoneMinHeight":0,"redstoneMaxHeight":16,"diamondSize":12,"diamondCount":1,"diamondMinHeight":0,"diamondMaxHeight":16,"lapisSize":8,"lapisCount":1,"lapisCenterHeight":16,"lapisSpread":16}复制代码功能是比较适合1.12原版生存，主要调整了矿石稀有度和矿脉大小，还对生物群系的生成调整了一点。
